title: Delaware Water Gap National Recreation Area: Our Staff & Offices
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management     Our Staff & Offices              Our Staff & Offices       Â    Mailing Address All correspondence may be addressed to:   Delaware Water Gap National Recreation Area 1978 River Road Bushkill, PA 18324   Fax Number (570) 426-2402  Telephone Administration Main Information Desk (570) 426-2452  Human Resources (570) 426-2456 Public Information Officer (570) 426-2472 Volunteers-in-Parks Coordinator  (570) 426-2443 Concessions  (570) 426-2440 Permits (570) 426-2440 Park Passes  (570) 462-2452 Group Campground Reservations (570) 426-2432 Deliveries (570) 426-2423   Law Enforcement  Chief Ranger (570) 426-2414 Ranger Office Dingmans Ferry  (570) 828-2321 Fire Management (570) 588-1845 Lost & Found (570) 426-2457 Cultural Resources Cultural Resource Manager (570) 588-3840 Natural Resources Division of Resource Management & Science (570) 296-6952 x 30 Agricultural Permits (570) 296-6952 x 27 All Other (570) 426-2452 For Emergenices call (570) 426-2457, or (800) 543-4295
